statements: SELECT * FROM product_defects;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, inspector_id FROM product_defects ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT defect_id, product_id, defect_type FROM product_defects WHERE inspector_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM product_defects WHERE defect_type = 'Scratch' ORDER BY defect_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_defects FROM product_defects GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
SELECT defect_id, product_id, defect_type, inspector_id, inspection_date FROM product_defects ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, inspector_id FROM product_defects WHERE product_id = 1 AND inspection_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, inspector_id, inspection_date FROM product_defects WHERE defect_type = 'Cracked' ORDER BY defect_id ASC
SELECT defect_id, product_id, defect_type, inspector_id, inspection_date FROM product_defects ORDER BY inspector_id, defect_type
SELECT * FROM product_defects WHERE inspector_id = 3 AND defect_type LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE inspector_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, defect_type FROM defects WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT inspector_name, department FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_id = 2;
SELECT defect_id, product_name, defect_type FROM defects ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'Critical' AND inspection_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE defect_id = 12345;
SELECT product_name, defect_type, inspector_id FROM defects WHERE inspection_date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT defect_id, product_name, inspector_name FROM defects JOIN inspectors ON defects.inspector_id = inspectors.inspector_id;
SELECT * FROM defects ORDER BY product_name DESC, inspection_date ASC;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_defects FROM inspectors JOIN defects ON inspectors.inspector_id = defects.inspector_id GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM ProductDefects
SELECT defect_id, defect_type FROM ProductDefects ORDER BY defect_id DESC
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date FROM Products WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT inspector_name FROM Inspectors WHERE inspector_id = 123
SELECT product_name, defect_type, inspection_date FROM Products INNER JOIN ProductDefects ON Products.product_id = ProductDefects.product_id
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, inspection_date FROM ProductDefects WHERE inspector_id = 1 ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND manufacturing_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT p.product_name, pd.defect_type, i.inspector_name FROM Products p JOIN ProductDefects pd ON p.product_id = pd.product_id JOIN Inspectors i ON pd.inspector_id = i.inspector_id WHERE pd.defect_type LIKE '%Scratch%' ORDER BY p.product_name;
SELECT pd.defect_type, COUNT(*) AS TotalDefects FROM ProductDefects pd GROUP BY pd.defect_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY TotalDefects DESC;

SELECT pd.defect_id, p.product_name, i.inspector_name FROM ProductDefects pd JOIN Products p ON pd.product_id = p.product_id JOIN Inspectors i ON pd.inspector_id = i.inspector_id WHERE p.product_name = 'Table' ORDER BY pd.defect_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductDefects WHERE defect_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, defect_type, defect_description FROM ProductDefects WHERE inspector_id = 3;
SELECT inspector_name FROM Inspectors WHERE inspector_department = 'Quality Control';
SELECT product_name, production_date, manufacturer FROM Products ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT defect_type, severity FROM DefectTypes WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM ProductDefects;
SELECT product_id, defect_type FROM ProductDefects WHERE inspector_id = 2 ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT defect_type, COUNT(defect_id) AS defect_count FROM ProductDefects GROUP BY defect_type HAVING defect_count > 2 ORDER BY defect_count DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, d.defect_type, dt.severity FROM Products p JOIN ProductDefects d ON p.product_id = d.product_id JOIN DefectTypes dt ON d.defect_type = dt.defect_type WHERE dt.severity = 'Critical';

SELECT i.inspector_name, i.inspector_department, COUNT(d.defect_id) AS total_defects FROM ProductDefects d JOIN Inspectors i ON d.inspector_id = i.inspector_id GROUP BY i.inspector_name, i.inspector_department ORDER BY total_defects DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inspectors;
SELECT name, department FROM Inspectors WHERE department='Quality Control';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM Products ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT defect_type, defect_description, defect_date FROM Defects WHERE defect_type='Major';
SELECT department_name FROM Departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%Engineering%';
SELECT * FROM Inspectors ORDER BY inspector_id DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM Inspectors WHERE department = 'Quality Control';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM Products WHERE manufacturer = 'Company ABC' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, defect_description FROM Defects WHERE defect_type = 'Critical';
SELECT department_name FROM Departments WHERE department_id IN (1, 2, 3);
